import React from 'react'; const NaturalRemedies = () => { return (
{/* Top Image */}

Natural Remedies

{/* Cramps Section */}

Remedies for Cramps

  • Warm Compress: Apply a heating pad or warm water bottle to your lower abdomen.
  • Ginger Tea: Drink ginger tea with honey to reduce inflammation and pain.
  • Yoga Poses: Practice gentle yoga poses like child's pose and cat-cow stretch.
  • Essential Oils: Use lavender or peppermint oil for aromatherapy.
{/* Back Pain Section */}

Back Pain Relief

  • Massage: Gentle massage with warm sesame oil can help relieve back pain.
  • Heat Therapy: Use a heating pad on your lower back.
  • Stretching: Simple back stretches and exercises.
  • Herbal Remedies: Try turmeric tea or cinnamon tea.
{/* Diet Tips Section */}

Dietary Recommendations

  • Iron-rich foods: Include spinach, dates, and pomegranate in your diet.
  • Anti-inflammatory foods: Consume turmeric, ginger, and berries.
  • Hydration: Drink plenty of water and herbal teas.
  • Foods to avoid: Reduce caffeine, salt, and sugar intake.
{/* Recommended YouTube Channels */}

Recommended YouTube Channels

{/* Dr. Manthena Satyanarayana Raju Official */}

Dr. Manthena Satyanarayana Raju Official

🔗 Watch on YouTube
  • Natural Diet Plans: Raw foods, fasting, and plant-based diets.
  • Detoxification Methods: Natural cleansing techniques.
  • Weight Loss & Fitness: Naturopathic approaches.
  • Disease Prevention: Solutions for diabetes, hypertension, digestion, etc.
  • Ayurvedic Healing: Drug-free, chemical-free natural healing.
{/* The Yoga Institute */}

The Yoga Institute

🔗 Watch on YouTube
  • Traditional Yoga: Beginner to advanced yoga techniques.
  • Yoga for Health: Special yoga routines for stress, PCOS, back pain, etc.
  • Pranayama & Meditation: Breathing techniques for relaxation.
  • Holistic Wellness: Diet, self-care, and emotional well-being.
  • Yoga Philosophy: Understanding yoga beyond just physical exercise.
{/* How These Channels Help */}

How These Channels Help with Period Pain Relief?

  • 🔥 Dr. Manthena’s Channel: Natural diet tips, herbal remedies, and detox techniques to reduce cramps.
  • 🧘 The Yoga Institute: Yoga asanas and breathing exercises for back pain, cramps, and stress relief.
); }; export default NaturalRemedies;
